locales.description:
A user who consistently engages in spamming behavior, such as posting repetitive content, irrelevant advertisements in replies, mass posting identical messages, or sharing unsolicited promotional material intended to disrupt the user experience.

This label does not apply to users or businesses posting legitimate content on their own profiles.
locales.name: Spammer

locales.description:
Content that is unmistakably spam, including repetitive posts, irrelevant advertisements in replies, mass posting of identical content, or unsolicited promotional material intended to disrupt the user experience.

This label does not apply to users or businesses posting legitimate content on their own profiles.
locales.name: Spam

locales.description: Content that includes links to malicious websites, malware, phishing scams, or any deceptive practices intended to harm users or compromise their security.
locales.name: Malicious Links, Malware or Scams

locales.description:
A user who repeatedly engages in bullying, harassment, or threats towards others. 

This includes sending intimidating messages, targeting individuals with harmful content, or any behavior intended to cause distress or fear.
locales.name: Harasser

locales.description: Bullying, harassment, and content meant to cause distress or intimidate individuals.
locales.name: Bullying, Harassment or Threats

locales.description:
Users who frequently posts hate speech or engages in other hateful conduct. 

This label is applied to users whose primary activity involves promoting hatred against individuals or groups based on attributes like race, religion, ethnicity, gender, or sexual orientation.
locales.name: Bigot

locales.description: Hate speech or engaging in other hateful conduct.
locales.name: Hate speech

locales.description: Profiles deliberately mimicking another person, group, or organization with the intent to mislead, deceive, or cause harm.
locales.name: Fake or impersonation account

locales.description: Profiler som med vilje etterligner en annen person, gruppe eller organisasjon med hensikt Ã¥ villede, bedra eller forÃ¥rsake skade.
locales.name: Falsk eller imiterende konto

locales.description: Profiles that do not impersonate someone else but use profile pictures, banners, or text that are not actually representative of themselves, thereby misleading others about who they are.
locales.name: Profile deception

locales.description:
Profiles portraying another person, group, or organization in a satirical or humorous manner.

Also used on profiles that is dedicated to posting satirical content.

These accounts must clearly state they are a parody and avoid misleading others about their intent.
locales.name: Parody account

locales.description:
Profiler som fremstiller en annen person, gruppe eller organisasjon pÃ¥ en satirisk eller humoristisk mÃ¥te. 

Disse kontoene mÃ¥ tydelig oppgi at de er en parodi og unngÃ¥ Ã¥ villede andre om deres hensikt.
locales.name: Parodikonto

locales.description:
Profiles created to show admiration or support for another person, group, or organization. 

These accounts must clearly state they are unofficial and not associated with the subject they represent.
locales.name: Fan account

locales.description:
Profiler opprettet for Ã¥ vise beundring eller stÃ¸tte for en annen person, gruppe eller organisasjon. 

Disse kontoene mÃ¥ tydelig oppgi at de er uoffisielle og ikke er tilknyttet emnet de representerer.
locales.name: Fankonto
